checkDatabaseDescription: Before proceeding, please double check that the scholarship is not already present in our database by entering its name or a prefix of its name below. Results are case-sensitive.
generalDescription: Please add the general information about the scholarship.
multipleMatches: There are multiple matches. Try narrowing your search.
requirementsDescription: Include information that is required for applicants to have.
reviewOnRight: Please review the information on the right.
tryVariations: Try variations of the scholarship name.
